title: Cherry Bomb Recipe
description: This cherry bomb drink is easy to make with rum, lime juice, lime soda, and grenadine for a fun, festive, and delicious cocktail perfect for parties.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Drinks Recipes Cocktail Recipes Rum Drinks Recipes Cherry Bomb 4.6 (43) 35 Reviews 6 Photos This cherry bomb is a wonderful rum drink with lime and grenadine that is great for any occasion. If this recipe seems too easy, it is, but the drink is delightful and worth the lack of trouble! Submitted by Tony Updated on March 18, 2024 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 6 6 6 6 Prep Time: 5 mins Total Time: 5 mins Servings: 4 Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 1 liter lime soda 4 fluid ounces rum 4 fluid ounces grenadine syrup 1 lime, juiced 1 lime, sliced 4 maraschino cherries Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Stir together lime soda, rum, grenadine, and lime juice in a mixing glass. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Pour into 4 chilled glasses. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Garnish with lime slices and cherries. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 50 home cooks made it! Thanks for sharing... 06 of 06 Photo by  Jennifer Ryan Frye 10/30/2011 Yummy and dangerous! name: Tony
instructions: Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios;Stir together lime soda, rum, grenadine, and lime juice in a mixing glass. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios;Pour into 4 chilled glasses. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios;Garnish with lime slices and cherries. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios
